::Slayer::

And antique? Slayer frowns, realizing he had no idea of when or how he 
had been made. But that didn't matter, he told himself, right now it 
was just the death of this bot that mattered.

"Fool, I do compare to the pit!" Slayer growls, his shoulder blasters 
emerging out of two openings in the shoulders of his suit, firing 
laser blasts at him along with a missile from his missile launchers, 
running out of ammo for them.

"When I kill you, I will take your body to Master Prebon. Perhaps he 
will place the spark of a *real* warrior in it!"
